named-native-query.name: Dish.findByCategoryId
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM dishes AS d INNER JOIN dish_category AS dc ON d.dish_id = dc.dish_id WHERE dc.category_id = :categoryId AND d.remain_quantity>0

named-native-query.name: Dish.findByCategoryIdAndStatusIn
named-native-query.query: SELECT d.* FROM dishes AS d INNER JOIN dish_category AS dc ON d.dish_id = dc.dish_id WHERE dc.category_id = :categoryId AND d.status_id IN(:statuses) AND d.remain_quantity>0

named-native-query.name: Dish.updateRemainQuantity
named-native-query.query: Update dishes AS d SET d.remain_quantity = :remainQuantity WHERE d.dish_id = :dishId

named-native-query.name: Dish.updateStatus
named-native-query.query: Update dishes AS d SET d.status_id = :statusId WHERE d.dish_id = :dishId
